attributes.action: Remove all dangerous cladding from flats by the end of July
attributes.additional_details: It is estimated that 23,000 homes are still at risk due to flammable cladding on the sides of their buildings. The Grenfell Tower Fire happened 3 years ago and there has been limited action done since this awful disaster to prevent it from happening again. It feels as if government do not care enough to change this cladding which could potentially take hundreds of innocent people’s lives
attributes.background: Remove any fire hazardous cladding, such as aluminium composite material from all apartment blocks, towers and flats by the end of July to ensure that no innocent lives are put at risk like there were at Grenfell Tower

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/327176
